thread.title: Jonathan Pie is coming to Leicester - here's how you can get tickets - Leicester Mercury

author: Hayley Watson
title: Jonathan Pie is coming to Leicester - here's how you can get tickets - Leicester Mercury
text:
Get Daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Love a good old fashioned rant about the state of politics today? 
Then you'll be pleased to hear that Jonathan Pie is bringing his latest tour to Leicester very soon. 
The fictional British news reporter is known for his brutally honest views on the world of politics, presented in the form of hilarious off-air camera clips. Read More Leicester Comedy Festival is back - line-up launched for 2018 event 
From Farage and Brexit to Donald Trump and fake news, nothing is off limits from Pie's sweary diatribes. 
The satirical character is the brainchild of actor and comedian Tom Walker, and rose to fame after YouTube clips of his act went viral. 
He'll be bringing his new tour Jonathan Pie - Back to the Studio to De Montfort Hall next year. Jonathan Pie is bringing his sweary political rants to Leicester 
So when and where can you see Jonathan Pie in Leicester? 
Jonathan Pie will be performing as part of Leicester Comedy Festival , which takes place in February next year. 
He will be headlining De Montfort Hall on Saturday, 24 February 2018. Read More
